TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataTemplateSelector extends System.Object

summary.span: 根據資料物件和資料繫結項目，提供方法來選擇 。

span.span: Provides a way to choose a based on the data object and the data-bound element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常您會建立有一個以上相同類型的物件，而且您想要提供您自己選擇的邏輯套用根據每個資料物件的屬性。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 請注意，如果您有不同的物件類型與您可以設定屬性。Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the property on the . 如果您這麼做，則不需要建立。If you do that then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果您有物件類型相同，但具有不同的屬性時，您也可以考慮使用或資料轉換。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要建立範本選擇器，請建立繼承自類別並覆寫方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 您的類別定義之後您可以指派給您的項目範本選取器屬性的類別的執行個體。Once your class is defined you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. ## Examples 在此範例中，繫結來源是一份`Task`物件。In this example, the binding source is a list of `Task` objects. 其中一個屬性`Task`物件是`Priority`。One of the properties of a `Task` object is `Priority`. 有兩個資料範本定義，`myTaskTemplate`和`importantTaskTemplate`。There are two data templates defined, `myTaskTemplate` and `importantTaskTemplate`. 要提供邏輯來選擇使用基於`Priority`值的資料物件，建立的子類別並覆寫方法。To supply logic to choose which to use based on the `Priority` value of the data object, create a subclass of and override the method. 在下列範例中，方法提供邏輯，以傳回適當的值為基礎的範本`Priority`屬性。In the following example, the method provides logic to return the appropriate template based on the value of the `Priority` property. 傳回範本的資源封套中找到項目。The template to return is found in the resources of the enveloping element. [!code-csharp[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#DTSClass](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/TaskListDataTemplateSelector.cs#dtsclass)] [!code-vb[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#DTSClass](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/visualbasic/tasklistdatatemplateselector.vb#dtsclass)] 然後，就可以宣告`TaskListDataTemplateSelector` 為資源：We can then declare the `TaskListDataTemplateSelector` as a resource: [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r1)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#DTS](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#dts)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r2)] 若要使用的範本選擇器資源，將它指派給屬性。To use the template selector resource, assign it to the property of the . 呼叫方法`TaskListDataTemplateSelector`每個基礎的集合中的項目。The calls the method of the `TaskListDataTemplateSelector` for each of the items in the underlying collection. 該呼叫會將資料物件當做項目參數傳遞。The call passes the data object as the item parameter. 所傳回的方法適用於該資料物件。The that is returned by the method is then applied to that data object. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#ItemTemplateSelector](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemtemplateselector)] 如需完整範例，請參閱[資料範本化範例簡介](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160009)。For the complete sample, see [Introduction to Data Templating Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160009).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Windows.DataTemplate SelectTemplate (object item, System.Windows.DependencyObject container);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.DataTemplate SelectTemplate(object item, class System.Windows.DependencyObject container) cil managed
Public Overridable Function SelectTemplate (item As Object, container As DependencyObject) As DataTemplate
public: virtual System::Windows::DataTemplate ^ SelectTemplate(System::Object ^ item, System::Windows::DependencyObject ^ container);

param.name: item
param.span: 要選取範本的資料物件。

span.span: The data object for which to select the template.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，根據自訂邏輯傳回 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a based on custom logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，當您有多個相同類型的物件定義的資料範本時使用範本選擇器。Typically, you use a template selector when you have more than one data template defined for the same type of objects. 比方說，如果您的繫結來源是清單學生物件清單和您想要特定範本可用於兼職學生。For example, if your binding source is list a list of student objects and you want to apply a particular template to the part-time students. 您可以藉由建立繼承自一個類別和覆寫方法。You can do this by creating a class that inherits from and overriding the method. 您的類別定義之後您可以指派給您的項目範本選取器屬性的類別的執行個體。Once your class is defined you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. ## Examples 在此範例中，繫結來源是一份`Task`物件。In this example, the binding source is a list of `Task` objects. 其中一個屬性`Task`物件是`Priority`。One of the properties of a `Task` object is `Priority`. 有兩個資料範本定義，`myTaskTemplate`和`importantTaskTemplate`。There are two data templates defined, `myTaskTemplate` and `importantTaskTemplate`. 要提供邏輯來選擇使用基於`Priority`值的資料物件，建立的子類別並覆寫方法。To supply logic to choose which to use based on the `Priority` value of the data object, create a subclass of and override the method. 在下列範例中，方法提供邏輯，以傳回適當的值為基礎的範本`Priority`屬性。In the following example, the method provides logic to return the appropriate template based on the value of the `Priority` property. 傳回範本的資源封套中找到項目。The template to return is found in the resources of the enveloping element. [!code-csharp[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#DTSClass](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/TaskListDataTemplateSelector.cs#dtsclass)] [!code-vb[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#DTSClass](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/visualbasic/tasklistdatatemplateselector.vb#dtsclass)] 然後，就可以宣告`TaskListDataTemplateSelector` 為資源：We can then declare the `TaskListDataTemplateSelector` as a resource: [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r1)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#DTS](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#dts)] [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#R2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#r2)] 若要使用的範本選擇器資源，將它指派給屬性。To use the template selector resource, assign it to the property of the . 呼叫方法`TaskListDataTemplateSelector`每個基礎的集合中的項目。The calls the method of the `TaskListDataTemplateSelector` for each of the items in the underlying collection. 該呼叫會將資料物件當做項目參數傳遞。The call passes the data object as the item parameter. 所傳回的方法適用於該資料物件。The that is returned by the method is then applied to that data object. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#ItemTemplateSelector](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemtemplateselector)] 如需完整範例，請參閱[資料範本化範例簡介](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160009)。For the complete sample, see [Introduction to Data Templating Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160009).
